targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select * from (select p.q, (p.price*$shares)/((t.value*70)) as "EV/EBITDA 12M" FROM (
SELECT
    toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(day, 44 , date))) as q,
    avgWeighted(close, volume) as price
FROM candles
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and period == 5
GROUP BY q) as p
LEFT JOIN $table as t ON p.q == t.quarter
WHERE t.indicator == '12M EBITDA' and t.sec_code == '$sec_code' and $dateCol >= toDate($from) and $dateCol <= toDate($to)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q , $forecast_price*$shares/(6058*70))
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 6, now()))) as q , $forecast_price*$shares/(6014*70)))
ORDER by q
targets.rawQuery:
select * from (select p.q, (p.price*837.72)/((t.value*70)) as "EV/EBITDA 12M" FROM (
SELECT
    toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(day, 44 , date))) as q,
    avgWeighted(close, volume) as price
FROM candles
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and period == 5
GROUP BY q) as p
LEFT JOIN default.financial_highlights as t ON p.q == t.quarter
WHERE t.indicator == '12M EBITDA' and t.sec_code == 'CHMF' and quarter >= toDate(1480961669) and quarter <= toDate(1654452869)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q , 1214*837.72/(6058*70))
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 6, now()))) as q , 1214*837.72/(6014*70)))
ORDER by q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select * from (select p.q, (p.price*$shares)/((t.value*70)*4) as "EV/EBITDA 3M" FROM (
SELECT
    toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(day, 44 , date))) as q,
    avgWeighted(close, volume) as price
FROM candles
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and period == 5
GROUP BY q) as p
LEFT JOIN $table as t ON p.q == t.quarter
WHERE t.indicator == 'EBITDA' and t.sec_code == '$sec_code' and $dateCol >= toDate($from) and $dateCol <= toDate($to)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q , ($forecast_price*$shares/(1526*70*4)))
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 6, now()))) as q , ($forecast_price*$shares/(1118*70*4))))
ORDER by q
targets.rawQuery:
select * from (select p.q, (p.price*837.72)/((t.value*70)*4) as "EV/EBITDA 3M" FROM (
SELECT
    toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(day, 44 , date))) as q,
    avgWeighted(close, volume) as price
FROM candles
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and period == 5
GROUP BY q) as p
LEFT JOIN default.financial_highlights as t ON p.q == t.quarter
WHERE t.indicator == 'EBITDA' and t.sec_code == 'CHMF' and quarter >= toDate(1480961669) and quarter <= toDate(1654452869)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q , (1214*837.72/(1526*70*4)))
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 6, now()))) as q , (1214*837.72/(1118*70*4))))
ORDER by q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avgWeighted(close, volume) as "Price close"
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    and sec_code == '$sec_code' and period == 5
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 2592000) * 2592000) * 1000 as t,
    avgWeighted(close, volume) as "Price close"
FROM default.candles
WHERE
    date >= toDateTime(1480961669) AND date <= toDateTime(1654452869)
    and sec_code == 'CHMF' and period == 5
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('CAPEX','Net cash (used in)/from investing activities - continuing operations'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as CAPEX,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('EBITDA','Gross profit'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as EBITDA,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('Revenue','Revenue - third parties'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as Revenue
from $table
where sec_code == '$sec_code' and $dateCol >= toDate($from) and $dateCol <= toDate($to)
group by quarter_name, $dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('CAPEX','Net cash (used in)/from investing activities - continuing operations'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as CAPEX,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('EBITDA','Gross profit'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as EBITDA,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(has(array('Revenue','Revenue - third parties'), indicator), 1), value, NULL)) as Revenue
from default.financial_highlights
where sec_code == 'CHMF' and quarter >= toDate(1521958771) and quarter <= toDate(1641277171)
group by quarter_name, quarter
order by quarter

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Profit before financing and taxation'), value, NULL)) as FCF,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Dividends paid'), value, NULL)) as Dividends
from $table
where sec_code == '$sec_code'
group by quarter_name,$dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Profit before financing and taxation'), value, NULL)) as FCF,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Dividends paid'), value, NULL)) as Dividends
from default.financial_highlights
where sec_code == 'CHMF'
group by quarter_name,quarter
order by quarter

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
   q,
   value as NWC
FROM (SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    (last_value(ca.value) - last_value(cl.value)) as value
    FROM $table as ca
    LEFT JOIN $table as cl on (cl.$dateCol == ca.$dateCol)
    WHERE ca.sec_code == '$sec_code' and cl.sec_code == '$sec_code' and ca.indicator == 'Total current assets' and cl.indicator == 'Total current liabilities'
    GROUP BY q, ca.indicator, cl.indicator
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 2, now()))) as q, 1040 as NWC)
    )
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT 
   q,
   value as NWC
FROM (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    (last_value(ca.value) - last_value(cl.value)) as value
    FROM default.financial_highlights as ca
    LEFT JOIN default.financial_highlights as cl on (cl.quarter == ca.quarter)
    WHERE ca.sec_code == 'CHMF' and cl.sec_code == 'CHMF' and ca.indicator == 'Total current assets' and cl.indicator == 'Total current liabilities'
    GROUP BY q, ca.indicator, cl.indicator
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 2, now()))) as q, 1040 as NWC)
    )
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, Revenue FROM (SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(value) as Revenue
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and indicator == 'Revenue'
GROUP BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 2, now()))) as q, 2886.5 as Revenue)
)
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, Revenue FROM (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(value) as Revenue
FROM default.financial_highlights
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and indicator == 'Revenue'
GROUP BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 2, now()))) as q, 2886.5 as Revenue)
)
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT q, sum(value) as Cost
FROM (SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Profit from operations'), -value, value)) as value
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Revenue - third parties', 'Revenue - related parties', 'Profit from operations'), indicator) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 1500 as Cost)
)
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT q, sum(value) as Cost
FROM (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Profit from operations'), -value, value)) as value
FROM default.financial_highlights
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Revenue - third parties', 'Revenue - related parties', 'Profit from operations'), indicator) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 1500 as Cost)
)
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(value) as Amortisation
FROM (SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(value) as value
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Depreciation and amortisation'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, sum(value) as Amortisation
FROM (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(value) as value
FROM default.financial_highlights
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Depreciation and amortisation'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(value) as "Interest paid"
FROM (SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(value) as value
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Interest paid'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, sum(value) as "Interest paid"
FROM (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(value) as value
FROM default.financial_highlights
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Interest paid'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(value) as "Income tax paid"
FROM (SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(value) as value
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Income tax paid'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, sum(value) as "Income tax paid"
FROM (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    indicator,
    last_value(value) as value
FROM default.financial_highlights
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Income tax paid'),indicator ) == 1
GROUP BY q, indicator)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, n.NWC/(r.Revenue*4) as "NWC as revenue"  FROM (SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(value) as Revenue
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and indicator == 'Revenue'
GROUP BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 2886.5 as Revenue)
) as r
left join (
SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    (last_value(ca.value) - last_value(cl.value)) as NWC
    FROM $table as ca
    LEFT JOIN $table as cl on (cl.$dateCol == ca.$dateCol)
    WHERE ca.sec_code == '$sec_code' and cl.sec_code == '$sec_code' and ca.indicator == 'Total current assets' and cl.indicator == 'Total current liabilities'
    GROUP BY q, ca.indicator, cl.indicator
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 2, now()))) as q, 1040 as NWC)
) as n on (r.q == n.q)
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, n.NWC/(r.Revenue*4) as "NWC as revenue"  FROM (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(value) as Revenue
FROM default.financial_highlights
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and indicator == 'Revenue'
GROUP BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 2886.5 as Revenue)
) as r
left join (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    (last_value(ca.value) - last_value(cl.value)) as NWC
    FROM default.financial_highlights as ca
    LEFT JOIN default.financial_highlights as cl on (cl.quarter == ca.quarter)
    WHERE ca.sec_code == 'CHMF' and cl.sec_code == 'CHMF' and ca.indicator == 'Total current assets' and cl.indicator == 'Total current liabilities'
    GROUP BY q, ca.indicator, cl.indicator
    UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 2, now()))) as q, 1040 as NWC)
) as n on (r.q == n.q)
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    trim(TRAILING '*' from product) as product,
    last_value(sales.value)*last_value(prices.price) as perc
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
       LEFT JOIN prices_for_products as prices ON
          sales.quarter == prices.quarter
      and sales.sec_code == prices.sec_code
      and trim(TRAILING '*' from prices.product) == trim(TRAILING '*' from sales.product)
WHERE sales.sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Semi-finished products',
     'Hot-rolled coil',
     'Hot-rolled plate',
     'Hot - rolled coil and plate',
     'Cold-rolled coil',
     'Colour coated coil',
     'Long products',
     'Metalware products',
     'Large diameter pipes',
     'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), trim(TRAILING '*' from sales.product)) == 1
GROUP BY q, product
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    trim(TRAILING '*' from product) as product,
    last_value(sales.value)*last_value(prices.price) as perc
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
       LEFT JOIN prices_for_products as prices ON
          sales.quarter == prices.quarter
      and sales.sec_code == prices.sec_code
      and trim(TRAILING '*' from prices.product) == trim(TRAILING '*' from sales.product)
WHERE sales.sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Semi-finished products',
     'Hot-rolled coil',
     'Hot-rolled plate',
     'Hot - rolled coil and plate',
     'Cold-rolled coil',
     'Colour coated coil',
     'Long products',
     'Metalware products',
     'Large diameter pipes',
     'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), trim(TRAILING '*' from sales.product)) == 1
GROUP BY q, product
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select q,structure, last_value(value) from (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    structure,
    avg(value) as value
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Iron ore pellets and concentrate',
     'Coking and Steam coal',
     'Transport and storage services',
     'Semi-finished products'
), structure) == 1
GROUP BY q, structure
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Iron ore pellets and concentrate' as structure, 124*980/1000 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Coking and Steam coal' as structure, 9 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Transport and storage services' as structure, 133 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Semi-finished products' as structure, 350*630/1000 as value)

)
GROUP BY q, structure
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
select q,structure, last_value(value) from (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    structure,
    avg(value) as value
FROM default.revenue_structure
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Iron ore pellets and concentrate',
     'Coking and Steam coal',
     'Transport and storage services',
     'Semi-finished products'
), structure) == 1
GROUP BY q, structure
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Iron ore pellets and concentrate' as structure, 124*980/1000 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Coking and Steam coal' as structure, 9 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Transport and storage services' as structure, 133 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Semi-finished products' as structure, 350*630/1000 as value)

)
GROUP BY q, structure
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
    q,
    sum(v) as "Rolled products"
FROM
(
    SELECT
        quarter as q,
        structure,
        last_value(value) as v
    FROM $table

    WHERE
        sec_code == '$sec_code'
        and has(array('Hot - rolled coil and plate', 'Galvanised and metallic coated coil', 'Cold-rolled coil', 'Colour coated coil', 'Long products'), structure) == 1
    GROUP BY
        q,
        structure
)
GROUP BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 974*2000/1000 as "Rolled products")
)
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
    q,
    sum(v) as "Rolled products"
FROM
(
    SELECT
        quarter as q,
        structure,
        last_value(value) as v
    FROM default.revenue_structure

    WHERE
        sec_code == 'CHMF'
        and has(array('Hot - rolled coil and plate', 'Galvanised and metallic coated coil', 'Cold-rolled coil', 'Colour coated coil', 'Long products'), structure) == 1
    GROUP BY
        q,
        structure
)
GROUP BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 974*2000/1000 as "Rolled products")
)
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select * FROM (
SELECT
    q,
    sum(v) as "Downstream products"
FROM
(
    SELECT
        quarter as q,
        structure,
        last_value(value) as v
    FROM $table

    WHERE
        sec_code == '$sec_code'
        and has(array('Metalware products', 'Large diameter pipes', 'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), structure) == 1
    GROUP BY
        q,
        structure
)
GROUP BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 450*1010/1000 as "Downstream products")
)
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
select * FROM (
SELECT
    q,
    sum(v) as "Downstream products"
FROM
(
    SELECT
        quarter as q,
        structure,
        last_value(value) as v
    FROM default.revenue_structure

    WHERE
        sec_code == 'CHMF'
        and has(array('Metalware products', 'Large diameter pipes', 'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), structure) == 1
    GROUP BY
        q,
        structure
)
GROUP BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 450*1010/1000 as "Downstream products")
)
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select q,production, last_value(ton)  from (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    production,
    last_value(value) as ton
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array('Crude Steel (Russian Steel)','Hot metal (Russian Steel)'), production) == 1
GROUP BY q, production
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Crude Steel (Russian Steel)' as production, 2950 as ton)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Hot metal (Russian Steel)' as production, 2800 as ton))
GROUP BY q, production
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
select q,production, last_value(ton)  from (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    production,
    last_value(value) as ton
FROM default.productions
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array('Crude Steel (Russian Steel)','Hot metal (Russian Steel)'), production) == 1
GROUP BY q, production
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Crude Steel (Russian Steel)' as production, 2950 as ton)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Hot metal (Russian Steel)' as production, 2800 as ton))
GROUP BY q, production
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    sales.quarter as q,
    last_value(prod.value) - last_value(sales.value)*1.075 as "production crude steel - sales products"
FROM $table as sales
LEFT JOIN productions as prod ON sales.quarter == prod.quarter and sales.sec_code == prod.sec_code
WHERE sales.product == 'Total steel products (Consolidated)' and sales.sec_code == '$sec_code' 
and prod.production = 'Crude Steel (Russian Steel)'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    sales.quarter as q,
    last_value(prod.value) - last_value(sales.value)*1.075 as "production crude steel - sales products"
FROM default.consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
LEFT JOIN productions as prod ON sales.quarter == prod.quarter and sales.sec_code == prod.sec_code
WHERE sales.product == 'Total steel products (Consolidated)' and sales.sec_code == 'CHMF' 
and prod.production = 'Crude Steel (Russian Steel)'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

panels.title: Разница между консолидированными продажами и производством сырой стали  ,  тыс. тон

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select t, avg(LoadingRZD*1000) as "Loading RZD avg" FROM (SELECT $dateCol as t, last_value(value) as LoadingRZD FROM $table WHERE name == 'szd' GROUP BY t
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfMonth(date_add(month, -1, $dateCol))) as t, last_value(value) as LoadingRZD FROM $table WHERE name == 'szd' GROUP BY t))
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
select t, avg(LoadingRZD*1000) as "Loading RZD avg" FROM (SELECT month as t, last_value(value) as LoadingRZD FROM default.loading_rzd WHERE name == 'szd' GROUP BY t
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfMonth(date_add(month, -1, month))) as t, last_value(value) as LoadingRZD FROM default.loading_rzd WHERE name == 'szd' GROUP BY t))
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select q,product,last_value(value)  from (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    product,
    value
FROM $table
WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and has(array(
'Coal',
'Iron ore',
'Rolled products',
'Downstream products',
'Semi-finished products',
'Total steel products (Consolidated)'
), product) == 1
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Coal' as product, 100 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Iron ore' as product, 980 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Rolled products' as product, 2000 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Downstream products' as product, 450 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Semi-finished products' as product, 350 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Total steel products (Consolidated)' as product, 2800 as value)
)
GROUP BY q, product
ORDER BY q, product
targets.rawQuery:
select q,product,last_value(value)  from (SELECT
    quarter as q,
    product,
    value
FROM default.consolidated_sales_for_products
WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and has(array(
'Coal',
'Iron ore',
'Rolled products',
'Downstream products',
'Semi-finished products',
'Total steel products (Consolidated)'
), product) == 1
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Coal' as product, 100 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Iron ore' as product, 980 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Rolled products' as product, 2000 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Downstream products' as product, 450 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Semi-finished products' as product, 350 as value)
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q, 'Total steel products (Consolidated)' as product, 2800 as value)
)
GROUP BY q, product
ORDER BY q, product

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select * FROM (
SELECT
    q,
    last_value(multiIf(equals(rolled, 0), coil, rolled)) as "Hot-Rolled"
    FROM (
      SELECT $dateCol as q,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot - rolled coil and plate', product), price, 0)) as rolled,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot-rolled coil', product), price, 0)) as coil,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot-rolled plate', product), price, 0)) as plate
      FROM $table
      WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code' and product LIKE 'Hot%' GROUP BY q)
GROUP BY q    
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q , $forecast_PriceAverage))
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
select * FROM (
SELECT
    q,
    last_value(multiIf(equals(rolled, 0), coil, rolled)) as "Hot-Rolled"
    FROM (
      SELECT quarter as q,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot - rolled coil and plate', product), price, 0)) as rolled,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot-rolled coil', product), price, 0)) as coil,
      max(multiIf(equals('Hot-rolled plate', product), price, 0)) as plate
      FROM default.prices_for_products
      WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF' and product LIKE 'Hot%' GROUP BY q)
GROUP BY q    
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q , 880))
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
  quarter as q,
  floor(revenue.value/sales.value * 1000) as "Rolled cons"
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
LEFT JOIN (SELECT sec_code, q, sum(v) as value
           FROM (
                SELECT
                    sec_code,
                    quarter as q,
                    structure,
                    last_value(value) as v
                FROM default.revenue_structure
                WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code'
                  and has(array('Hot - rolled coil and plate', 'Galvanised and metallic coated coil', 'Cold - rolled coil', 'Colour coated coil', 'Long products'), structure) == 1
                GROUP BY q, structure, sec_code)
           GROUP BY q, sec_code
) as revenue
ON revenue.sec_code = sales.sec_code and revenue.q = sales.quarter
where sales.product == 'Rolled products'
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q , $forecast_PriceAverage*1.107)
)
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
  quarter as q,
  floor(revenue.value/sales.value * 1000) as "Rolled cons"
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
LEFT JOIN (SELECT sec_code, q, sum(v) as value
           FROM (
                SELECT
                    sec_code,
                    quarter as q,
                    structure,
                    last_value(value) as v
                FROM default.revenue_structure
                WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF'
                  and has(array('Hot - rolled coil and plate', 'Galvanised and metallic coated coil', 'Cold - rolled coil', 'Colour coated coil', 'Long products'), structure) == 1
                GROUP BY q, structure, sec_code)
           GROUP BY q, sec_code
) as revenue
ON revenue.sec_code = sales.sec_code and revenue.q = sales.quarter
where sales.product == 'Rolled products'
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q , 880*1.107)
)
ORDER BY q

targets.query:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
  quarter as q,
  floor(revenue.value/sales.value * 1000) as "Downstream"
FROM consolidated_sales_for_products as sales
LEFT JOIN (SELECT sec_code, q, sum(v) as value
           FROM (
                SELECT
                    sec_code,
                    quarter as q,
                    structure,
                    last_value(value) as v
                FROM default.revenue_structure
                WHERE sec_code == '$sec_code'
                  and has(array('Metalware products', 'Large diameter pipes', 'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), structure) == 1
                GROUP BY q, structure, sec_code)
           GROUP BY q, sec_code
) as revenue
ON revenue.sec_code = sales.sec_code and revenue.q = sales.quarter
where sales.product == 'Downstream products' and sec_code == '$sec_code'
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q , $forecast_PriceAverage*1.144)
)
ORDER BY q

  quarter as q,
  floor(revenue.value/sales.value * 1000) as "Downstream"

           FROM (
                SELECT
                    sec_code,
                    quarter as q,

                FROM default.revenue_structure
                WHERE sec_code == 'CHMF'
                  and has(array('Metalware products', 'Large diameter pipes', 'Other tubes, pipes, formed shapes'), structure) == 1
                GROUP BY q, structure, sec_code)
           GROUP BY q, sec_code
) as revenue
ON revenue.sec_code = sales.sec_code and revenue.q = sales.quarter
where sales.product == 'Downstream products' and sec_code == 'CHMF'
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 3, now()))) as q , 880*1.144)
)
ORDER BY q

    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(price) as Index62Fe

WHERE product == 'Fe'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

    quarter as q,

FROM default.fob_prices

GROUP BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(perc) as IronSlab FROM (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value)*last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
       LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
           financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
        and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
   and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q, structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , $forecast_IronSlab)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, sum(perc) as IronSlab FROM (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value)*last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
       LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
           financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
        and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
   and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q, structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , 244)

SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(value) as Pellets
FROM default.material_cost_structure
WHERE material == 'Pellets'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(value) as Scrap
FROM $table
WHERE material == 'Metal scrap'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(value) as Scrap
FROM default.material_cost_structure
WHERE material == 'Metal scrap'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(value) as Power
FROM $table
WHERE material == 'Power'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(value) as Power
FROM default.material_cost_structure
WHERE material == 'Power'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select
    toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, $price_lag_months, date))) as q,
    avg(close) as 62PercFe
from $table
WHERE code == 'SGXIOSc1'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
select
    toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 2, date))) as q,
    avg(close) as 62PercFe
from default.stock_prices
WHERE code == 'SGXIOSc1'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(price) as Index62Fe
FROM $table
WHERE product == 'Fe'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(price) as Index62Fe
FROM default.fob_prices
WHERE product == 'Fe'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(perc) as IronSlab FROM (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value)*last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
       LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
           financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
        and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
   and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q, structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , $forecast_IronSlab)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, sum(perc) as IronSlab FROM (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value)*last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
       LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
           financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
        and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
   and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q, structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , 244)

panels.title: Корреляция индекса ЖРС и железной части кеш-кост сляба

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(if(runningDifference(export)>0,runningDifference(export),export)) as Export,
    last_value(if(runningDifference(cis)>0,runningDifference(cis), cis)) as "CIS"
FROM $table

where name = 'ВОЛОГОДСКАЯ ОБЛАСТЬ'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    month as q,
    last_value(if(runningDifference(export)>0,runningDifference(export),export)) as Export,
    last_value(if(runningDifference(cis)>0,runningDifference(cis), cis)) as "CIS"
FROM default.export_regions

where name = 'ВОЛОГОДСКАЯ ОБЛАСТЬ'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q

panels.title: Экспорт ВОЛОГОДСКАЯ область, млн. долл. США

list.definition:
SELECT floor(sum(perc)+$forecast_IronSlab,1) as Slab
FROM (
      SELECT last_value(quarter) as q,
             last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value) * last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
      FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
               LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
              financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
              and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
      WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
        and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
      GROUP BY structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
list.name: forecast_Slab
list.query:
SELECT floor(sum(perc)+$forecast_IronSlab,1) as Slab
FROM (
      SELECT last_value(quarter) as q,
             last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value) * last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
      FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
               LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
              financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
              and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
      WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
        and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
      GROUP BY structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
